title: Jonathon Boyd Chase Human Rights Fellowship Fund
description: To provide summer stipends to law student(s) to enable them to work during the summer in a supervised setting on behalf of persons with cases involving human rights, civil rights or civil liberties.
marketingContent: To provide summer stipends to law student(s) to enable them to work during the summer in a supervised setting on behalf of persons with cases involving human rights, civil rights or civil liberties.
